full_summary:
================#

### Tender Announcement: Office Furniture
#### Government of Canada

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of office furniture for various workplaces in the National Capital Region (NCR).

### Tender Details

| Reference Number | Amendment Number |
| --- | --- |
| WS4643279830-Doc4655156523 | 6 |

### Tender Details
The tender closing date is **July 19, 2024**, at **14:00 EST**. However, please note that the Ariba Discovery posting has been updated to reflect an immediate response deadline.

### Background

The PSPC invites propsals from eligible suppliers for Category 1, 2, 3, and 5 office furniture for the Queen PSIB Workspaces.

### Contracting Entity Information

* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
* Canada

### Contact Information

Should you have any questions or require more information, please do not hesitate to contact:

Quan, King (SPAC/PSPC)
King.quan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Documents

The tender documents are available through the Ariba Discovery portal. Please refer to the notice URL for additional details.

* Notice URL: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20135455?extsite=MjAxMzU0NTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
* Category: Office Furniture (UNSPSC 56101700)

### Award Criteria

The proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

### Important Notes

Please ensure that all required supporting documentation and bid submissions are made by **July 19, 2024**, at **14:00 EST** to be considered responsive.

### Expiration Note

This tender announcement has expired. Please check the Ariba Discovery portal for the updated tender details.
